description: Earlier reports that one of them, Giuseppe Berardelli, gave his respirator away have been denied.
title: Coronavirus: At least 50 priests killed by coronavirus
title_page: Coronavirus: At least 50 priests killed by coronavirus - BBC News
maintext: Giuseppe Foresti, who worked with him in the Casnigo diocese, said news that he had given the respirator away were "fake" - and that Berardelli had simply not been able to tolerate it because he had a pre-existing condition.
